sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) Once per game session, the character can choose to make one skill check using Willpower, rather than the characteristic linked to that skill. When he does this, he must explain how, in this particular instance, his willpower is helping him overcome his challenge.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Force of Will</name> <number>TAL0001291</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-18 15:06:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7601417d2fa8e890e0f497eef699b659</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-18 15:06:39</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
